title: "Feeding the machine: We give an AI some headlines and see what it does"
excerpt: "Initially, I saw two possible approaches to training an algorithm to get a probability of any given headline's success: Binary classification: We simply determine what the probability is of the headline falling into the \"win\" or \"lose\" column based on previous winners and losers."
